### Invitation to Qualify - Halfway Brook Bridge Replacement, Cape Breton Highlands National Park
#### Reference Number
CB-8095-25009238

#### Publication Date
August 11, 2023

#### Tender Closing Date and Time
August 29, 2023, 1:00 PM AST

#### Expected Contract Commencement Date
September 5, 2023

#### Expected Contract Completion Date
July 24, 2025

#### Brief Description of the Requirement
Parks Canada invites qualified contractors to submit an Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) for the replacement of the Halfway Brook Bridge in Cape Breton Highlands National Park. The project involves the replacement of an 18.7m single span concrete structure with a new 42m, two lane, single span, twin trapezoidal steel box girder bridge.

#### Technical Requirements
The new bridge will include a fully integral piled abutments and deck along with a new asphalt wearing surface. Contractor is expected to perform and complete the work no later than July 24, 2025.

#### Evaluation Criteria
The evaluation will be based on the Bidder's qualifications, as indicated in the ITQ document.

#### Solicitation Method
This is a two-stage process. Bidders responding to this selection process must submit a bid in two stages.

- Stage 1: Evaluation of the Bidder's qualifications
- Stage 2: Invitation to Tender for further qualifications and financial evaluation

#### Requirements for Submitting Bids
To ensure timely evaluation of your bid, it is essential to submit it by email only to the specified email address, [soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca](mailto:soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca). We accept email attachments up to 15 MB.

Please note that we do not accept bids submitted by:

- Fax
- In-person
- Courier
- Direct email to the Contracting Authority
- Emails with links to bid documents

We have made every effort to provide equivalent documents in both official languages. If you notice any discrepancies, please notify the contract officer as soon as possible.

#### Contact Information
